content: I see what you mean. I've been noticing a trend in the job market, with more companies looking for professionals with skills in AI and machine learning. I've already started taking online courses to upskill and reskill, particularly in tools like Python and Tableau. I'm hoping to stay competitive in the market and enhance my skills. By the way, I've been working as a marketing specialist for 11 months now, and I'm excited to see how these new skills will impact my role.
